long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a Chrome extension named "Search on Genspark". This extension allows you to directly launch Genspark from the Chrome search box. Users can input the content they want to ask Genspark by pressing space after the keyword "g". Once this input is completed, the search will start automatically. This feature is designed to allow users to quickly search for information. By using this extension, you can significantly improve the efficiency of your information search.  

Here are some of the main features of this extension:  

1. Easy Operation: You can input the content you want to ask Genspark by simply pressing space after the keyword "g".
2. Automatic Search: The search will start automatically once the input is completed.
3. Efficient Information Search: By using this extension, you can significantly improve the efficiency of your information search.

Install "Search on Genspark" now and experience a new possibility in information search!
